  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/3590</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/3590</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Habitació amb vistes al mar</string>
            <string language="en">Room with a sea view</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Raum mit einer Seeansicht</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pièce avec une vue de mer</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Quarto com uma vista do mar</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Stanza con una vista del mare</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δωμάτιο με μια όψη θάλασσας</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) que treballa les raons trigonomètriques d'un angle agut en un triangle rectangle i llurs relacions. Proposa diferents exercicis que s'han de resoldre amb l'ajuda  de la calculadora i s'utilitza la trigonometria per a la resolució de problemes de la vida real. Conté exercicis d'autoavaluació.</string>
            <string language="en">Mini teaching unit (MUD) on the trigonometric functions of an acute angle in a right triangle and their relationships. Pupils solve different exercises with the help of a calculator, and use trigonometry to solve real-life problems. Self-assessment exercises are also included.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">matemàtiques aplicades</string>
            <string language="en">applied mathematics</string>
            <string language="es">matemáticas aplicadas</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">vida quotidiana</string>
            <string language="en">everyday life</string>
            <string language="es">vida cotidiana</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">geometria</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">simulació</string>
            <string language="en">simulation</string>
            <string language="es">simulación</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">trigonometria</string>
            <string language="en">trigonometry</string>
            <string language="es">trigonometría</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit (SCHLAMM) auf den 
trigonometrischen Funktionen eines spitzen Winkels in einem rechten 
Dreieck und in ihren Verhältnissen. Pupillen lösen 
unterschiedliche Übungen mit Hilfe eines Rechners und verwenden 
Trigonometrie, um real-life Probleme zu lösen. Selbstbewertung 
Übungen sind auch eingeschlossen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement (BOUE) sur les 
fonctions trigonométriques d'un angle aigu dans une bonne triangle et
leurs rapports. Les pupilles résolvent différents exercices à
l'aide d'une calculatrice, et emploient la trigonométrie pour 
résoudre des problèmes réels. Des exercices de 
art de l'auto-portrait-assessment sont également inclus.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini (LAMA) nas funções 
trigonometric de um ângulo agudo em um triângulo direito e em seus 
relacionamentos. As pupilas resolvem exercícios diferentes com 
a ajuda de uma calculadora, e usam o trigonometry resolver problemas 
real-life. Os exercícios do self-assessment são incluídos 
também.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione (FANGO) sulle funzioni 
trigonometriche di un angolo acuto in un giusto triangolo e nei loro 
rapporti. Le pupille risolvono le esercitazioni differenti per 
mezzo di un calcolatore ed usano la trigonometria per risolvere i 
problemi in vivo. Le esercitazioni di valutazione di se stesso 
egualmente sono incluse.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στις trigonometric 
λειτουργίες μιας οξείας γωνίας σε ένα σωστό τρίγωνο και σχέσεις
τους. Οι μαθητές λύνουν τις διαφορετικές ασκήσεις με τη 
βοήθεια ενός υπολογιστή, και trigonometry χρήσης για να λύσουν
τα πραγματικά προβλήματα. Οι ασκήσεις αυτοαξιολόγησης 
συμπεριλαμβάνονται επίσης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">angewandte Mathematik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">tägliche Lebensdauer</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geometrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
